block.title: Slack Configuration
block.text: Choose ONE of the following authentication methods: - Recommended: Bot Token (starts with xoxb-) - Alternative: Webhook URL (starts with https://hooks.slack.com/)
Proxy Configuration (optional - leave blank if not needed)

block.title: Setup Guide
block.text:
Bot Token Setup: 1. Visit https://api.slack.com/apps 2. Create New App or select existing app 3. Go to OAuth and Permissions 4. Add Bot Token Scopes: chat:write, chat:write.public 5. Install App to Workspace 6. Copy Bot User OAuth Token (starts with xoxb-) 7. Paste token above and click Save
Webhook URL Setup: 1. Visit https://api.slack.com/apps 2. Select your app 3. Activate Incoming Webhooks 4. Add New Webhook to Workspace 5. Copy Webhook URL 6. Paste URL above and click Save
Note: Messages will be sent to #security-firewall-alert channel
